name: riptide granny hoodie
notes:
hi! this riptide hoodie pattern is available for free to view on the blog through the link here on ravelry.  it's also available as an ad-free printable pattern for purchase on etsy here: https://www.etsy.com/listing/1460451882/granny-hoodie-easy-crochet-pattern

description:
here’s your perfect, comfy, year-round hoodie! throw it over a tank or tee and pair it with jeans, shorts or a skirt. you can even wear it as a super cute swimsuit cover up! featuring an oversized fit and loose airy fabric, you’ll never want to take it off. simply crochet rectangles and seam them together to make this super easy sweater. crochet the open front cardigan style, or make it a sweatshirt style with a simple seam up the front! directions included for both style options.

skill level:

easy +

materials:

us size j, 6.0 mm crochet hook

5 (6, 7, 8, 10, 11, 13, 14) lion brand mandala ombre worsted weight #4 in cool 344 yd and
150 g/skein 

pattern uses approximately 680 g (837, 1011, 1201, 1406, 1628, 1866, 2121) grams

scissors

tapestry needle

sizes:

s, m, l, xl, xxl, 3xl, 4xl, 5xl


*hoodie features positive ease for an oversized fit

i hope that you enjoy it!
